pr_title: Return table or view when listing for tables with fully qualified name

timeline.bodyText:
i think this should be
boolean isExistingRelation(Session session, QualifiedObjectName name)
timeline.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText: I would not call it simplification :p
timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.bodyText:
This is an SPI change now. I am not sure we want this.
@findepi, @martint ?
timeline.author: losipiuk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +73,18 @@ default ConnectorTableHandle getTableHandle(ConnectorSession session, SchemaTabl
         return null;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Return true if table or view with specified name exists.
+     */
+    default boolean isExistingRelation(ConnectorSession session, SchemaTableName objectName)

timeline.bodyText: Personally I would prefer just two ifs here :)
timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.message: Return table or view when listing for tables with fully qualified name
